member.name: T:MegaIDE.RecentDocuments
member.summary: Class containing static methods to save recently opened documents list either in a file or registry .

member.summary: Load the recently opened documents list from the file specified.
member.param: Path of the file to load lists from.

member.summary: Saves recently opened documents list to the file specified.
member.param: Path of the file to save lists to.

member.name: M:MegaIDE.RecentDocuments.LoadListFromRegistry
member.summary: Load the recently opened files and projects list from the registry (from "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\RoboAntz Labs\MegaIDE\Recent Documents").

member.name: M:MegaIDE.RecentDocuments.SaveListToRegistry
member.summary: Saves the recently opened documents list in the registry (at "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\RoboAntz Labs\MegaIDE\Recent Documents").

member.summary: Adds a file path to the recent files list.

member.summary: Removes a file path from the recent files list.

member.summary: Adds a project file path to the recent projects list.

member.name: M:MegaIDE.RecentDocuments.RemoveFromRecentProjects(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a project file path from the recent projects list.

member.summary: Gets the recently opened projects list.

member.summary: Applies the syntax settings to all the open pages.

member.summary: Closes an open tab for a particular file.
